name: Kyoob Dash
description:
the kyoob is a part of a "shape" army governed by the creator, made specifically for war and concurring, The player is a type of kyoob which has defected from the shape program and aims to take it down.

this game is a little project that i have been working on, its main feature is the mobility options of the game. there are the simple options like crouch sliding, walking and dashing. there are more unique methods like the grapple and the time warp. there are even some skilful means like grapple chaining, side jumps, dash spam, rewind dash, long grapples, grapple flings, DGMPs and grapple flicks amongst many others.

the game is currently in development of the 0.1 update, being the first beta update out of alpha.  although most features and levels of the game are not final, they have the theming and direction the NSG wants to take.

there are currently over 5 different gamemodes with the sixth being the focus of this next big update. there are currently 4 single player gamemodes and 2 planned multiplayer ones. 

the 0.1 or PVP update is set to release on the 30/4/2022
